channel.title: Open Source on Aesthetics of the Absurd
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Aesthetics of the Absurd

item.title: Some Resources for Free Photography Software
item.description: A lizard pauses for a photo I took last year on a rafting trip in the Grand Canyon. [Flickr, 500px] Whether you are a budding amateur or a seasoned professional photographer, the software tools you use play an important role in organizing, editing, and showing your photos. Maybe you are tired of continuing to pay Adobe as all their software moves to subscriptions or are looking for some of the best tools out there which also happen to be free.
